metadata.description: Our story is about life of Knitty, who loves to knit as a gesture of love to her beloved ones. Knitty knits sweaters for everyone in the town and she lives a happy life next to neighbours. This small town consist of 999 people, and here in this collection we are going to meet them all. In this town everyone is unique and has their own skills and style, and that’s what makes Knitty’s land special.
metadata.name: KnittyNFT #1
